verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> another <S%G243><s%> mighty <S%G2478><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> come down <S%G2597><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, clothed <S%G4016><s%> with a cloud <S%G3507><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> a rainbow <S%G2463><s%> was upon <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> head <S%G2776><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> face <S%G4383><s%> was as it were <S%G5613><s%> the sun <S%G2246><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> pillars <S%G4769><s%> of fire <S%G4442><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> he had <S%G2192><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> a little book <S%G974><s%> open <S%G455><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> he set <S%G5087><s%> his <S%G846><s%> right <S%G1188><s%> foot <S%G4228><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> his left <S%G2176><s%> foot on <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>,

And <S%G2532><s%> cried <S%G2896><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%>, as <S%G5618><s%> when a lion <S%G3023><s%> roars <S%G3455><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> he had cried <S%G2896><s%>, seven <S%G2033><s%> thunders <S%G1027><s%> uttered <S%G2980><s%> their <S%G1438><s%> voices <S%G5456><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> thunders <S%G1027><s%> had uttered <S%G2980><s%> their <S%G1438><s%> voices <S%G5456><s%>, I was about <S%G3195><s%> to write <S%G1125><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to me <S%G3427><s%>, Seal up <S%G4972><s%> those things which <S%G3739><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> thunders <S%G1027><s%> uttered <S%G2980><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> write <S%G1125><s%> them <S%G5023><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the angel <S%G32><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> stand <S%G2476><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> lifted up <S%G142><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>,

And <S%G2532><s%> swore <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> him that lives <S%G2198><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> and ever <S%G165><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> created <S%G2936><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the things that <S%G1722><s%> in it <S%G846><s%> are <S%G2532><s%>, and the earth <S%G1093><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the things that <S%G1722><s%> in it <S%G846><s%> are <S%G2532><s%>, and the sea <S%G2281><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the things which <S%G1722><s%> are in it <S%G846><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> there should be <S%G2071><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> longer <S%G2089><s%>:

But <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> of the voice <S%G5456><s%> of the seventh <S%G1442><s%> angel <S%G32><s%>, when <S%G3752><s%> he shall begin <S%G3195><s%> to sound <S%G4537><s%>, the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G99999><s%> should be finished <S%G5055><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> he has declared <S%G2097><s%> to his <S%G1438><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> to <S%G3326><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> again <S%G3825><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%>, Go <S%G5217><s%> and take <S%G2983><s%> the little book <S%G974><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is open <S%G455><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the hand <S%G5495><s%> of the angel <S%G32><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> stands <S%G2476><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I went <S%G565><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the angel <S%G32><s%>, and said <S%G3004><s%> to him <S%G846><s%>, Give <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> the little book <S%G974><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> to me <S%G3427><s%>, Take <S%G2983><s%> it <S%G2532><s%>, and eat <S%G2719><s%> it <S%G846><s%> up <S%G2719><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> it shall make <S%G4087><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> belly <S%G2836><s%> bitter <S%G4087><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> it shall be <S%G2071><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> sweet <S%G1099><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> honey <S%G3192><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I took <S%G2983><s%> the little book <S%G974><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of the angel <S%G32><s%>'s hand <S%G5495><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ate <S%G2719><s%> it <S%G846><s%> up <S%G2719><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> it was <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> sweet <S%G1099><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> honey <S%G3192><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> as soon as <S%G3753><s%> I had eaten <S%G5315><s%> it <S%G846><s%>, my <S%G3450><s%> belly <S%G2836><s%> was bitter <S%G4087><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> to me <S%G3427><s%>, You <S%G4571><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> prophesy <S%G4395><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> before <S%G1909><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> peoples <S%G2992><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> tongues <S%G1100><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> kings <S%G935><s%>.
